attributes.action: SCRAP  BOROUGH PARKING WARDENS / STREET WARDENS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: SCRAP THE PARKING WARDENS. AND STREET THEY CAUSE PROBLEMS.AND ARE JUST OUT THERE TO MAKE MONEY OUT OF YOU.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
